body.name: HOMEXCEL Reusable Microfiber Mop Pads for Swiffer PowerMop, Power Mop Pads Refills for 13''-15'' Spray Mop, Machine Washable Power Mop Pads Replacement for Multi-Surface Floor Cleaning, Pack of 4
features: 【Compatible with Swiffer PowerMop】Our power mop refills are designed to perfectly fit the Swiffer PowerMop and other 13”-15” mop. Keep in mind that they are not suitable for Swiffer WetJet and Swiffer Sweeper. The mop pads easily attach and remover from the mop, providing convenient usability.

【Versatile Dry and Wet Cleaning】 HOMEXCEL microfiber mop pads replacement excel in capturing dust, dirt, debris, and pet hair during dry sweeping. They are equally effective in handling stains, water spots, and oil stains during wet mopping. Ideal for efficient cleaning of floors, ceilings, walls, and even for washing windows.

【Efficient Cleaning Performance】Crafted from high-quality microfiber fiber material, these power mop pads ensure effective cleaning and robust water absorption. They are a sustainable choice for your daily home, office, or kitchen floor cleaning needs.

【Safe for All Floor Types】These versatile mop pads are suitable for use on all sealed hard floor surfaces, including wood, marble, laminate, and tile. Rest assured that they won't cause scratches or stains on your floors, and they dry quickly without leaving water marks.

【Save Your Money】Save both time and money with our reusable, machine-washable mop pads. One microfiber mop pad can replace over 150 disposable mop pads, offering long-lasting use and promoting environmental sustainability. Get a set of 4 mop pads for extended use, ensuring a consistently clean and comfortable home.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #24,046 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #62 in Household Replacement Mop Pads

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I used to buy the disposable pads for my swiffer but I enjoy this way more! the pads are absorbent and gets the job done. I use it as a way to reduce my waste and it's also not a hassle to clean at all since you can just put it in the wash with your other cleaning towels. With these, I don't have to constantly run out to get more of the disposable ones and have these on hand at all times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent mop pad replacements. Slightly smaller than Bona brand pads.
reviews.reviewText: We got these mop pad replacements to supplement the pads with our Bona hard wood floor mop. They work very similarly to those microfiber pads. We spray the floor with Bona wood cleaning solution, then mop over it.The pads stick to the hook and loop underside of the mop head with no issues. The only difference other than the color (purple versus blue) to the Bona brand pads that we have on hand is that these are slightly smaller than those pads by an inch or so lengthwise. It doesn't affect how it attaches to the mop head and doesn't really affect performance, other than it covers a slightly smaller surface area when mopping the floor. It's not significant enough for us to make a difference though.If you like the price, go for it. It's worked well for us so far. I can't comment on longevity though, but I would guess that these will last as long as the name brand pads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality replacement pads
reviews.reviewText: Even without the cost and environmental benefits, reusable cloth pads are preferable because you can put more force into them and they just clean better. I really like these for dry cleaning & was surprised how much pet hair they pick up. Now I’m keeping a couple of pads just for dry mopping to see if they last longer.Have no idea if it will make a difference, just curious. The adhesion is fine and I like the quality of the pads. Can’t complain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HOMEXCEL Reusable Pads, Your Floor's New BFF!
reviews.reviewText: Say goodbye to the mop-pad blues with HOMEXCEL Reusable Microfiber Pads! These playful wonders are the ultimate sidekick for your Swiffer PowerMop, promising a dance of cleanliness on your floors. The pack of four reusable pads is a sustainable spin on traditional mop pads, making every cleaning session an eco-friendly fiesta. They're not just a one-time wonder; toss them in the machine, and they're ready to groove again. It's time to let your floors show off their sparkling moves with HOMEXCEL – where cleaning meets play!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit our Swiffer perfectly and do the job
reviews.reviewText: These replacement pads fit our Swiffer perfectly and do the job. I like how thick they are as we have a lot of pet hair to absorb from our wood floors throughout the house. My wife loves the color and the fact we can wash them and reuse them. Having an 8-pack of reusable pads should set us up for quite a long while!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but not great. A bit too soft
reviews.reviewText: Saves money bc they replace the one-time disposable type.Also better for the environment bc they are machine washable.I wish the fabric was a bit stiffer to help scrub off dried cat vomit, food, etc. It is instead very soft fabric, so I have to press down hard when using it with my (seperately sold) mop.The very soft fabric would probably be perfect for use on more delicate hardwood, though.And as u can see in one of my pics of the underside, it did pick up a lot of the dust/grime/dirt off my floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thicker and more sturdy than some other brands.Absorbent and cleans well.Does not stick very well compared to other brands I’ve used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you own a Swiffer this attaches pretty easily to the Velcro style at the base of the Swiffer wet jet. The pads are slightly larger than the Swiffer itself but I am not complaining. Removing is as easy as just pulling it off. I found that mopping, I use two of the pads so I can do two rounds of mopping and then I can pre rinse them before I throw them in the wash. They're perfect and for the price, I really enjoyed the quality. Highly recommend!
